channel.title: Scary internet memes
channel.description:
I decided to make this after i read about the "smile.jpg"
I wanted to know more scary internet memes.
Share them and let the community read about them.
Please post links instead of the whole article.
*I guess a meme is a story that has been passed through the internet for peoples enjoyment. I could be wrong if you have a better definition leave a post saying it thank you. :]

item.title: Scary internet memes
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:14, topic:373033”][quote author=k0 twin link=topic=469053.msg3430253#msg3430253 date=1292279336]

I hate you now.
I went to cleverbot.com
I said to it, “ben.”
and it instantly said, “You’ve met with a terrible fate, haven’t you?”
And I instantly started crying. I don’t know why. I still am though.
And on my agenda today I had planned to play majora’s mask on my emulator.

What the fuck? Please tell me you’re not actually crying.

And I just deleted the paragraphs of text I had typed because I just read the link to the guy explaining everything haha.
[/quote]

Well if you went to the website, you would see that he admits to it being modded and everything you just said. He also is trying to release to the public because now he has a story and he will base it off the legend of zelda majora’s mask game. So the game you seen in the videos were just little snippits of of the game he will be releasing. I actually want to play it.[/quote]

Yeah I edited my post after seeing that somebody linked his statement. And I agree I’m definitely interested in playing. Zelda games are my favorite of all time.

Read full topic

item.title: Scary internet memes
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:13, topic:373033”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=469053.msg3430209#msg3430209 date=1292277099]
I hate you now.
I went to cleverbot.com
I said to it, “ben.”
and it instantly said, “You’ve met with a terrible fate, haven’t you?”
And I instantly started crying. I don’t know why. I still am though.
And on my agenda today I had planned to play majora’s mask on my emulator.
[/quote]

What the fuck? Please tell me you’re not actually crying.

And I just deleted the paragraphs of text I had typed because I just read the link to the guy explaining everything haha.[/quote]

Well if you went to the website, you would see that he admits to it being modded and everything you just said. He also is trying to release to the public because now he has a story and he will base it off the legend of zelda majora’s mask game. So the game you seen in the videos were just little snippits of of the game he will be releasing. I actually want to play it.

Read full topic

item.title: Scary internet memes
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:11, topic:373033”][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=469053.msg3430239#msg3430239 date=1292278760]
Google “Cynthia Garris Zombie”. You’ll be scarred for life.
[/quote]
why would that scare you?[/quote]
I saw it when I was 5 (or so). It was the first scary move I’ve ever seen (The Shining - 1996). And it tears me up inside when I see it.

leavingthreadb4someonepostsit…
